text: Select All that are correct for using this class:
options: class Car { public $color; private $type; function getType() { return $this->type; } function setType($newType) { $this->type = $newType; } } $my_car = new Car(); $my_car->color = 'White';
To use this syntax $my_car->type = 'Coupe', property 'type' should be public.
answer: To use this syntax $my_car->type = 'Coupe', property 'type' should be public.

text: Which of the following statement is incorrect:
In a REST API, the Response code 500 indicates:
options: The resource was not found (for example, attempting to delete an author with an ID that does not exist)
An error occurred on the server side
The request hit a valid endpoint but was malformed and could not be completed
Along with 403 Forbidden, represents a valid request, but one that would not be completed due to a lack of permissions
answer: An error occurred on the server side

Select all the correct statements:
options: getters and setters are used to access property 'type' as it is private.
getters and setters are not used to access property 'type' as it is private. It will throw an error.
Only way to access 'type' property is to make is public.
answer: Only way to access 'type' property is to make is public.

text: Select all that can be compiled from the following script:
options: $dbc = @mysqli_connect(DB_HOST, DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME) OR die ('Could not connect to MySQL: ' . mysqli_connect_error());

PHP script will continue to execute even if there is an error in creating a connection with database.

text: mysqli_num_rows(mysqli_result $result) is used to return the number of rows fetched from the server.
Select all that applies for mysqli_query()
options: This function accepts 2 arguments, 1. Database connection 2. Query to be executed.
This will not execute the query.
It will execute the query if provided with correct arguments.
answer: This function accepts 2 arguments, 1. Database connection 2. Query to be executed.
It will execute the query if provided with correct arguments.

text: Match the File Opening Modes and their description.
options: W OR W2 Opens a file for write only. If file not exist then new file is created and if file already exists then contents of file is erased. -W
Opens file for read and write. If file not exist then new file is created and if file already exists then contents of file is erased. -W+
answer: W OR W2 Opens a file for write only. If file not exist then new file is created and if file already exists then contents of file is erased.

text: PHP programming language is :
The inspection process is called filtering, where only valid data is allowed to enter the application database.
In a REST API, the Response code 400 indicates:
options: The resource was not found (for example, attempting to delete an author with an ID that does not exist)
Along with 403 Forbidden, represents a valid request, but one that could not be completed due to a lack of permissions
The request hit a valid endpoint but was malformed and could not be completed
An error occurred on the server side.
answer: The request hit a valid endpoint but was malformed and could not be completed

text: SELECT a.name, b.title FROM books b, authors a WHERE a.authorid = b.authorid;
options: Aliases are not allowed on table names but column names only.
In the above query, 'a' and 'b' are the aliases for table authors and books respectively.
This query has an error and will not execute.
answer: In the above query, 'a' and 'b' are the aliases for table authors and books respectively.

text: Cross Site Scripting is
options: A security vulnerability that allows an attacker to interfere with the queries that an application makes to its database
An attacks that occur when an attacker uses a web application to send malicious code, generally in the form of a browser side script, to a different end user
answer: An attacks that occur when an attacker uses a web application to send malicious code, generally in the form of a browser side script, to a different end user

SQL Injection is
options: An attacks that occur when an attacker uses a web application to send malicious code, generally in the form of a browser side script, to a different end user.
A security vulnerability that allows an attacker to interfere wit the queries that an application makes to its database
answer: A security vulnerability that allows an attacker to interfere wit the queries that an application makes to its database

text: Choose an option that defines the functioning of break statement in php.
options: It causes the loop to skip the remainder of its body and immediately retest its condition prior to reiterating.
It terminates the for loop or switch statement and transfers execution to the statement immediately following the for loop or switch.
answer: It causes the loop to skip the remainder of its body and immediately retest its condition prior to reiterating.

text: Choose the option with correct PHP code:
options: <?php echo 'Hello World! This is my first PHP Script!'; ?>
o<?php echo 'Hello World! This is my first PHP Script!'; ?>
<? echo 'Hello World! This is my first PHP Script!'; ?>
<?php echo 'Hello World! This is my first PHP Script!'; ?>
answer: <?php echo 'Hello World! This is my first PHP Script!'; ?>
